Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.util

C-JDBC internal utilities such as locks, statistics and exceptions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Constants Constants that are common to the console, driver and controller modules
FileManagement This class defines a FileManagement that provides tools to manage files and directories.
LoggingOutputStream An OutputStream that flushes out to a Category.
ReadPrioritaryFIFOWriteLock Reader/Writer lock with write priority.
ReadWrite This class defines reading and writing convenient methods
SplitXmlTask Defines the SplitXml Ant target used to prepare the C-JDBC scripts generation.
Stats This class provides thread-safe statistics.
Strings This class provides utilities for Strings manipulation.
Zipper Zip utility class to compress a directory into a single zip file and vice-versa.
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.common.util Description

C-JDBC internal utilities such as locks, statistics and exceptions.
